# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this item at a special introductory price of $13500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive exceptional value while also maximizing my return on investment. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
